skills.name: animation
skills.desc: Imbue objects with the power of motion

skills.name: magiphysics
skills.desc: The study of magic in motion.

tasks.name: puppet show
tasks.desc: Put on a show with animated puppets

tasks.name: lease labor
tasks.desc: Lend some of your machinae to perform menial tasks

tasks.name: plan future
tasks.desc: Counsel with your automata to plan the future.

upgrades.name: clockwork expansion
upgrades.desc: Expand the clockwork home with additional materials
upgrades.flavor: The jutting limbs are very helpful for household maintenance

upgrades.name: clockwork expansion
upgrades.desc: Expand the clockwork home with additional materials
upgrades.flavor: The moving floors really cut down on foot traffic

upgrades.name: clockwork expansion
upgrades.desc: Expand the clockwork home with additional materials
upgrades.flavor: The home anticipates your wants and needs

upgrades.name: endless expansion
upgrades.desc: More...

upgrades.name: puppet strings
upgrades.desc: Buy some extra-strength strings for your puppetry needs
upgrades.flavor: You are the one in control

upgrades.name: ebonwood supply
upgrades.desc: Procure a supply of ebonwood to strengthen your puppets
upgrades.flavor: The dark coloring is handy for assasinations

upgrades.name: runic reinforcement
upgrades.desc: Carve the runes of strength and protection into your puppets
upgrades.flavor: The faint glow of the runes looks quite striking

upgrades.name: puppet proxies
upgrades.desc: Throw your voice and will through specially-made puppets

upgrades.name: proxy amplification
upgrades.desc: Use your puppet proxies to amplify your memory

upgrades.name: puppet spies
upgrades.desc: Nobody would notice

upgrades.name: clockwork butler
upgrades.desc: Serves you tea, scones and books.

upgrades.name: precision engineering
upgrades.desc: Precision to the millimeter.

upgrades.name: oil of slipping
upgrades.desc: Adapt a common magical item as a lubricant for your machinae.
upgrades.flavor: Comes in handy in multiple situations

upgrades.name: automated appraiser
upgrades.desc: Some gems are more than what they look like

upgrades.name: automated miner
upgrades.desc: Greedily delve deeper

upgrades.name: efficient algorithms
upgrades.desc: Efficient instructions for best performance

upgrades.name: automated laboratory
upgrades.desc: A thinking, living place of research

upgrades.name: automata studies
upgrades.desc: Spend time researching the secrets of the mind

upgrades.name: automata agents
upgrades.desc: Agents capable of independent completion of any desired task

upgrades.name: automata mastery
upgrades.desc: A complete mastery over all things mechanical

upgrades.name: mastery of form
upgrades.desc: Learn the deepest secrets of shaping

spells.name: prismatic missile
spells.desc: A burst of chaotic magic inflicting damage to enemies.

spells.name: construct puppet attacker
spells.desc: Summon a temporary puppet to assist you in a fight

spells.name: construct mecha-charger
spells.desc: Summon a temporary machina to assist you in a fight

spells.name: construct autoslayer
spells.desc: Summon a temporary automata to assist you in a fight

spells.name: animate bulwark
spells.desc: A sturdy puppet lurches between you and danger.

homes.name: clockwork home
homes.desc: A house of gears and levers, constantly adjusting to the requirements of its occupant.

furniture.name: puppet-making workshop
furniture.desc: A specialized workshop for efficiently producing puppets.

furniture.name: puppet assembly line
furniture.desc: A dedicated assembly line for automated production of puppets.

furniture.name: machina workshop
furniture.desc: A place to tinker with your machinae.

furniture.name: machina assembly
furniture.desc: A complex mechanism for automating the production of machinae.

furniture.name: shaping laboratory
furniture.desc: A facility for efficiently growing mind-crystals and pre-formed automata bodies.
furniture.flavor: This was a triumph. I'm making a note here, 'Huge Success.'

furniture.name: automata vats
furniture.desc: Rows upon rows of crystal-growing vats, shaping automata according to your parameters.

resources.flavor: A skilled user could put on a marvellous show.

resources.name: machinae
resources.desc: Towering hulks of metal, ready to do their master's bidding.

resources.name: automata
resources.desc: Constructs of translucent crystal; they possess a pristine intellect for learning.
resources.flavor: It's not smarter than you, surely.

monsters.name: automata servant
monsters.desc: A shining servant of the castle.

monsters.name: brass knight
monsters.desc: A shining knight in brass armor.

monsters.name: automata chef
monsters.desc: An automated cook with sharp knives and a hardened brass shell, looking to make you the next meal.

monsters.name: mechanical crow
monsters.desc: A mechanical crow-like contraption, it watches with gemstone eyes.

monsters.name: pristine automated mage
monsters.desc: A collection of runes, gems and brass capable of dangerous spellcasting.

monsters.name: pristine brass knight
monsters.desc: A shining knight in brass armor. Not a mark spoils its features

monsters.name: pristine castle core
monsters.desc: A supporting unit for the replica, capable of summoning and maintaining masses of reinforcements.

monsters.name: corivar's replica
monsters.desc: What stands before you is a result of hubris unimaginable, borne out of desire to achieve immortality. It thinks it's Corivar. It most certainly is not.

monsters.name: corivar's castle core
monsters.desc: A large mobile core that darts around the castle reshaping and remaking its subjects.

monsters.name: mechanical crow
monsters.desc: A mechanical crow-like contraption, it watches with gemstone eyes.

monsters.name: automata servant
monsters.desc: A shining servant of the castle.

monsters.name: brass knight
monsters.desc: A shining knight in brass armor.

monsters.name: crossbow sentry
monsters.desc: A ranged guard firing brass arrows.

monsters.name: automated mage
monsters.desc: A collection of runes, gems and brass able to cast a few spells.

monsters.name: copper scout
monsters.desc: A fast moving, green cloaked rogue, looking to call out your every movement.

classes.flavor: No matter what, the strings would not break.

classes.name: mechanist
classes.flavor: What is a man? An inefficient form of labor.

classes.name: mechamancer
classes.flavor: If you want a better future, make better people.

encounters.name: rusted sickle
encounters.desc: A rusted sickle lays abandoned. Curiously, it seems to have never had a handle.

encounters.name: chatty farmer
encounters.desc: You barely manage to escape his endless complaints about his rich neighbor.

encounters.name: blood
encounters.desc: A crushed, mangled corpse of a critter lies in the fields, cut apart by an uncaring plow.

encounters.name: pile of wood?
encounters.desc: Upon closer inspection it appears to be an old, discarded puppet.

encounters.name: automated plower
encounters.desc: A lone mechanism plows the fields for its rich master.

encounters.name: upturned soil
encounters.desc: A patch of uneven ground with the soil exposed to the elements, likely to become barren. What kind of farmer misses something like this?

encounters.name: scrap pile
encounters.desc: A pile of scrap metal sits on the floor, once a useful mechanical servant

encounters.name: darting figures
encounters.desc: Someone's gaze is fixed on you from a distance, from time to time they move with inhuman speed.

encounters.name: complex locks
encounters.desc: A formerly-locked gate, the rusted and broken remains of the locks on the ground. Laid open for all to see, they reveal mechanisms that were once brilliantly complex.

encounters.name: far-off castle
encounters.desc: A large castle in the distance, is it a trick of the eye or are the windows themselves moving?

encounters.name: clear pathing
encounters.desc: Small roads even out here are clear of any growth. Good for getting some reading done while you travel.

encounters.name: rusted scrap pile
encounters.desc: A corroded green pile of scrap with a gemstone in the wreck. Did it just try and move?

encounters.name: rotten corpse
encounters.desc: A brutally butchered animal, left to rot. Who would do this in the middle of nowhere?

encounters.name: overrun gardens
encounters.desc: Large patches of plants tangle around rusted scrap halting its movement.

encounters.name: landscapers
encounters.desc: Automated laborers seen at a distance still maintain the closest grounds of the castle.

encounters.name: fazbit's helpers
encounters.desc: Still maintaining the workshop after centuries... as much as they can

rares.name: loose cog
rares.desc: Large enough to accomodate a finger.

rares.name: brass bauble
rares.desc: A small piece of brass, resembling a good luck charm.

locales.name: Village fields
locales.desc: The nearby village's fields are vast and full of opportunity for an aspiring mage.

locales.name: Corivar's Castle Courtyard
locales.desc: The large grounds before the locked away estate once owned by Corivar.

dungeons.name: Corivar's Castle
dungeons.desc: A large castle moving and shaping itself endlessly.

clashes.name: Clockwork sanctum
clashes.desc: In the innermost part of a castle you find a chamber, guarded by unusually well-armed automata. it's clear that whatever's controlling the castle is here.

events.name: Faraway Estate
events.desc: A quick visit to the village's headsman confirms rumors of a castle, which, despite being abandoned for as long as anyone can remember, still appears to be in pristine condition.

events.name: Clockwork core
events.desc: In the remains of Corivar's replica you find an odd brass orb, serving as it's core. It must certainly be worth studying.

upgrades.name: runed brass orb
upgrades.desc: An orb consisting of multiple layers of brass, each covered in runes too tiny to have been engraved by human hand. It appears to contain memories belonging to Corivar, but so far no method has succeeded in retrieving them.
